text:
Trasquera is a "comune" (municipality) in the Province of Verbano-Cusio-Ossola in the Italian region Piedmont.
Trasquera is about northeast of Turin and about northwest of Verbania. It is in the Val Divedro, on the border with Switzerland. As of 2004, 247 people lived there. It has an area of.
Trasquera is next to these municipalities: Bognanco, Crevoladossola, Domodossola, Varzo, Zwischbergen (Switzerland).
